channel.title: Virtual Innovation Consortium
channel.description: Recent content on Virtual Innovation Consortium

item.title: Our Consortium
item.description:
Higher Education Partners

  • ISTEC (Portugal): Expertise in computer science, strong industry ties.

  • EUNEIZ (Spain): Focus on tech and digital media aligned with job market needs.

  • UNINT (Italy): Global outlook, XR in education, and cybersecurity programmes.

Research Institutions

  • ENTI-UB (Spain): Immersive tech, video games, cybersecurity, and a top-tier XR lab.

  • PoliMI (Italy): Advanced facilities for 3D modelling and virtual interaction.

  • RAS Institute (Bulgaria, France, UK): Policy-driven research, strategic EU alignment.

VET Providers

  • Cacttus Education (Kosovo): Accredited ICT training for network and app development.

item.title: Project Presentation
item.description: The project addresses Europe’s advanced digital skills gap, focusing on Extended Reality (XR) technologies like Augmented and Virtual Reality. By uniting higher education institutions, VET providers, industry, and research organisations, it will create a specialised Master’s Programme (ISCED Level 7, 120 ECTS), an advanced training programme with self-standing modules, and an annual Summer School.
